title: *PATREON PREVIEW* No Ceilings
description:
Pull up, post up, pour up, we’re bringing back that old boyz only feeling for all our best friends on Patreon because TF doesn’t have fans, we have family. The Core Four debate Lil Wayne and T.I.’s output, bask in their newfound financial success, address the haters and losers of which sadly there are many, consider the ramifications of bringing Larry’s wife onto the pod, assess Jimmy’s horniness levels now that he’s freshly wifed up, pop Chuck’s natural wine cherry, get to the bottom of why Chef is now playing drums for Jason Mraz and much more. Roasted and toasted live from Chateau Jimbo, this is The Only Podcast That Matters™.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
